mapper.insert: insert into activity_commodity (activity_commodity_id, activity_id, commodity_id, sample, activity_sell_price, activity_purchase_price, activity_commodity_status, activity_commodity_create_date, sell_price, purchase_price, activity_commodity_remark ) values (#{activity_commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sample,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_sell_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activity_purchase_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activity_commodity_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_commodity_create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sell_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchase_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activity_commodity_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update activity_commodity set activity_id = #{activity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commodity_id = #{commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sample = #{sample,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_sell_price = #{activity_sell_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, activity_purchase_price = #{activity_purchase_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, activity_commodity_status = #{activity_commodity_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_commodity_create_date = #{activity_commodity_create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sell_price = #{sell_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, purchase_price = #{purchase_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, activity_commodity_remark = #{activity_commodity_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where activity_commodity_id = #{activity_commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select activity_commodity_id, activity_id, commodity_id, sample, activity_sell_price, activity_purchase_price, activity_commodity_status, activity_commodity_create_date, sell_price, purchase_price, activity_commodity_remark from activity_commodity where activity_commodity_id = #{activity_commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
